metadata.description: Opinionated development workflow for Medusa v2 + Strapi 5 + Next.js 15/16 teams. Thoughtful development with path-scoped rules and async documentation maintenance.

plugins.name: solsdev
plugins.description: Complete stack-aware development workflow for e-commerce teams. Includes 4 core skills (requirements-clarifier, implementation-planner, breakthrough-generator, doc-maintenance), path-scoped rules for Medusa v2/Strapi 5/Next.js 15/16, cart/checkout patterns, CMS integration guides, and comprehensive gotchas documentation.

plugins.name: github-push-pr
plugins.description: Complete GitHub workflow automation with security-first approach. Enforces feature branch workflow, runs security checks, creates PRs via GitHub CLI, and iterates on ClaudeBot feedback automatically. Includes 4 skills: git-workflow-enforcer, pr-creator, claudebot-feedback-loop, and thoughtful-pr-workflow.
